mapper.select: select p.productNum, p.productName, c.categoryCode, c.categoryCodeRef, c.categoryName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, regdate, p.productImage, p.productThumbnail from product p inner join product_category c on p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode where p.categoryCode = #{categoryCode} or c.categoryCodeRef = #{categoryCodeRef}

select p.productNum, p.productName, c.categoryCode, c.categoryCodeRef, c.categoryName, productPrice, productStock, productDescription, regdate, p.productImage, p.productThumbnail from product p inner join product_category c on p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode where p.productNum = #{productNum}
mapper.insert: insert into product_reply (productNum, memberId, replyContent, replyDate) values (#{productNum}, #{memberId}, #{replyContent}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select productNum, memberId, replyContent, replyDate from product_reply where productNum = #{productNum} order by replyNum desc;
